metadata.name: Trust, Clear, & Just Be
metadata.description:
Surrendering to the heart,
An inner work of art.
Listening to the material essence,
An embodiment of our true existence.

Finding inner peace within stillness.
Serenity within nothingness.
Remembering why we are here,
An experience so dear.

Honoring all that is.
A breath wrapped in tears,
Watering our hearts,
A seed where growth starts.

Dedicated to a family that took me in and enlightened my being. I am forever grateful.

Comes with the original physical piece.
Framed with museum glass ;)
